flowsDir.label: Flows Directory
flowsDir.help: Custom directory for flow definitions (default: ~/.clawdbot/flows). Use ~/clawd/jobs for job tracking system.

sessionTimeoutMinutes.label: Session Timeout (minutes)
sessionTimeoutMinutes.help: How long before inactive flow sessions expire (1-1440 minutes)

sessionCleanupIntervalMinutes.label: Cleanup Interval (minutes)
sessionCleanupIntervalMinutes.help: How often to check for expired sessions (1-60 minutes)

enableBuiltinHistory.label: Enable History Logging
enableBuiltinHistory.help: Save completed flows to .jsonl files (can be disabled if using custom storage backend)

maxFlowsPerUser.label: Max Flows Per User
maxFlowsPerUser.help: Limit concurrent flows per user (leave empty for unlimited)

llm.label: LLM Configuration
llm.help: Settings for AI-powered flow generation and adaptation

llm.defaultProvider.label: Default Provider
llm.defaultProvider.help: LLM provider to use (e.g., anthropic, openai)

llm.defaultModel.label: Default Model
llm.defaultModel.help: Model to use for LLM operations (e.g., claude-sonnet-4-5)
